title: Bir Bahadur Singh Sports College, Gorakhpur
text:
Veer Bahadur Singh Sports College, Gorakhpur is a residential <a href="sports%20college">sports college</a> in <a href="Gorakhpur%2C%20Uttar%20Pradesh">Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh</a>, established in 1988. It offers sports training in <a href="association%20football">football</a>, <a href="Field%20hockey">hockey</a>, <a href="wrestling">wrestling</a>, <a href="Sport%20of%20athletics">athletics</a>, <a href="badminton">badminton</a>, <a href="Swimming%20%28sport%29">swimming</a> and <a href="kabaddi">kabaddi</a> in 6th to 12th standard and with the curriculum of the <a href="Board%20of%20High%20School%20and%20Intermediate%20Education%20Uttar%20Pradesh">U.P. Board</a>. It is the second sports college established in <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a> after <a href="Guru%20Gobind%20Singh%20Sports%20College">Guru Gobind Singh Sports College</a> of <a href="Lucknow">Lucknow</a> and before <a href="Etawah%20district">Etawah</a>'s <a href="Saifai%20Sports%20College">Saifai Sports College</a>.
History.
After the success of <a href="Guru%20Gobind%20Singh%20Sports%20College">Guru Gobind Singh Sports College, Lucknow</a>, the <a href="government%20of%20Uttar%20Pradesh">government of Uttar Pradesh</a> established this sports college in Gorakhpur in 1988–1989.
